Name: Ukhar
About the game: Ukhar is a 2D action adventure game set in a sword and sorcery world. After exhausting the resources of Ka'ur's realm, the ambitious necromancer Kairus, is conducting his raider army towards the city of Avendia. Devastating everything upon their path, they burn Ukhar's camp and kidnap the lovely Neia. Push back your limits and become stronger every level by facing all kinds of monstrous creatures. But above all ... help the young barbarian to defeat his enemies and save the beloved Neia, from Kairus' grasp. Sword and sorcery world. Fight your enemies with a variety of weapons. Hand-drawn cutscene art narrate the story segments. 22 levels spread over 7 different places. Awe-inspiring soundtrack selected from Purple Planet.
